headline: Evolv Technology Announces the Appointment of Henrik Kühl as a New Independent Director
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., February 12, 2026--Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVLV), a leading security technology company pioneering AI-based solutions designed to create safer experiences, today announced the appointment of Mr. Henrik Kühl, age 46, to its Board of Directors ("Board") effective February 12, 2026. Kühl will also serve on the Board’s Audit Committee. The Board affirmatively determined that Kühl is independent and an audit committee financial expert as that term is defined by appl

content.title: Evolv Technology Announces the Appointment of Henrik Kühl as a New Independent Director
content.summary: WALTHAM, Mass., February 12, 2026--Evolv Technologies Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVLV), a leading security technology company pioneering AI-based solutions designed to create safer experiences, today announced the appointment of Mr. Henrik Kühl, age 46, to its Board of Directors ("Board") effective February 12, 2026. Kühl will also serve on the Board’s Audit Committee. The Board affirmatively determined that Kühl is independent and an audit committee financial expert as that term is defined by appl
